    public class Zombie
extends game.ZombieActor
    A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
    Author:
    ram.

    • Method Detail

      • getHurtingActorExit

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location getHurtingActorExit(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location currentHere)
        Get the location of any actor on the map that is adjacent to this zombie. This method is only called when a zombie is attacked, so there is bound to be at least the player adjacent to zombie.
        Parameters:
        currentHere - - Location of the zombie on the map.
        Returns:
        Location of adjacent actor.

      • hurt

        public void hurt(int points)
        Description copied from class: edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Do some damage to the current Actor. If the Actor's hitpoints go down to zero, it will be knocked out.
        Overrides:
        hurt in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        points - number of hitpoints to deduct.

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
        Description copied from class: edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.
        Overrides:
        getIntrinsicWeapon in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Returns:
        a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        If a Zombie can pick up a weapon it will. If not, it will attack if possible. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed
